title: Fantasy Book Series
body:
{{champion:267}} Any suggestions for more to read? My husband is going away for quite a few months overseas and I am going to be pouting and trying to pass the time by keeping busy with reading. I love fantasy/sci-fi reads and I am burning through a ton of them. Here is what I have read so far in the genres:

Lightbringer Series (currently reading)
Dresden Series 
Expanse Series
Night Angel Series
Codex Alera
LotR + Hobbit
Song of Ice & Fire
Harry Potter
Elder Scrolls Series
Kingkiller Chronicle
Twilight (oh god why)
Mistborn Series


If you guys can think of any I need to add please let me know!
